archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Customer Order Status Notification
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Manage notifications to processes and other parties registered to receive notifications of any status changes. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Reserved for future use.
